title: Problem launching the game
body:
Yesterday, I updated the client after not playing for a while and a screen popped up after it was done saying I had a couple of changes to make, which linked me to an FAQ. The game would not let me log in whatsoever, so I followed the steps to update the icons like it said on the FAQ, but nothing worked at all, so I uninstalled the game and reinstalled it.

Not only do I have the same launcher icons as before, but now the launcher won't even load. I've seen mentions of a "LeagueClient" file, but I don't have it in my LoL directory. All I have are the following : 

*  Logs 
*  RADS 
*  lol.launcher.admin 
*  lol.launcher

I miss this game and I want to play it again, so can anyone help please?

replies.body:
If I understand correctly, it sounds like you're still on the legacy client and unable to update.  As a first step, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and use it to reinstall the game to fix up any bad files.

I also recommend going over the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case your OS or antivirus settings have changed and blocking your game files from scanning.  That should do it, but let me know if you have any questions!

Still not working. The launcher is exactly the same as it was, I'm still missing the same files. The League logo pops up for a second, the loading bar fills up a little bit but as soon as it does, it closes and doesn't do anything else.

Thanks for the update!  It still sounds like something is trying to prevent it from launching.  In this case hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and attach the logs provided in the HRT.  Our tech team will work with you and get this figure out.  We'll see you there!

Exactly this happend to me 2. All i get is ''League of legends has encountered a problem. Please re- install league of legends and try again.'' I already installed it 5 times over and over, but even when i follow the tips on this site from the rioters over how 2 fix it, nothing works. It will only display the old leauge icon. And for the rest is it the same as xXp0wergam3rXx hase stated here above. I would hate 2 decay, so please help me fix this!
